mapper.select: SELECT ar.id, ar.resource_name, ar.url, ar.parent_id, ar.resource_code, ar.resource_type, ar.is_del FROM djmall_auth_user_role aur LEFT JOIN djmall_auth_role_resource arr ON aur.role_id = arr.role_id LEFT JOIN djmall_auth_resource ar ON arr.resource_id = ar.id WHERE aur.user_id = ${userId}

SELECT au.*,ar.role_name as roleName FROM djmall_auth_user au LEFT JOIN djmall_auth_user_role aur ON au.id = aur.user_id LEFT JOIN djmall_auth_role ar ON aur.role_id = ar.id
au.user_name like "%"#{userEntity.userName}"%"
AND au.user_sex = #{userEntity.userSex}
order by au.id desc
